lines.text: W powietrzu czuć zapach już najlepszych dni (ja-ja, ja-ja-ja)
lines.translation: The air already smells of the best days (me-me, me-me-me)
lines.grammar: Polish line: Highlight case endings, aspect pairs for verbs, and common particles like 'że'. lines.text: Znam ciszę i krzyki, na imię mi Polska
lines.translation: I know silence and screams, my name is Poland
lines.grammar: Polish line: Highlight case endings, aspect pairs for verbs, and common particles like 'że'. Key phrase: 'Znam ciszę i krzyki, na imię mi Polska' → 'I know silence and screams, my name is Poland'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: A wszystko co było, znów wraca przez sny
lines.translation: And everything that was, comes back again through dreams
lines.grammar: Polish line: Highlight case endings, aspect pairs for verbs, and common particles like 'że'.
